title: Agility Training Design Project Based on Ecological Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners experience integrated cognitive-behavioral training in simulated real-game environments and perform data analysis using personal devices in a BYOD setting

learning_goals: Learners successfully perform 80% or more of cognitive-behavioral integration training under conditions similar to competitive environments
Learners design three or more training scenarios applying ecological dynamics principles in team sports (soccer/rugby, etc.)
Learners provide feedback that improves training effectiveness by 20% or more through analysis of individual agility data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
